title: Stunning 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home
posting_body: Stunning SFH with 3beds,2baths plus bonus room with half bath in the heart of SUNNYVALE!
Spacious living room offers open beam ceilings and large picture windows filled with natural lights.
Sunny and bright kitchen boasts quartz counters, white cabinets, SS appliances, and island with breakfast bar.
Private backyard enjoys concrete patio and mature trees, perfect for entertaining all year round.
Fresh interior paint, Double Pane Windows, Central heat and air, and two-car garage.
Great location within walking distance to schools, parks, and shopping center.
Close to Google, Apple, LinkedIn, and other high techs.
Message me with a number to schedule a showing!
